snippet.title: Dance Dance Revolution USA - MAME 0.209 GIT - 60FPS Native
snippet.description:
This is DDR USA running on Mame 0.209. 

This is possible thanks to the work of lots of people on the System 573 driver, which makes all digital sound games run pretty flawlessly except for some details here and there. There are many many games that run on this board and all those have pretty complex audio decoders so it's pretty awesome to see them finally running properly!

For more about this, you can check the Pull Request that was merged:
https://github.com/mamedev/mame/pull/5055
